title: Can I get banned if my friends (all duo) report me for inting their/our game? (Normal game)
body: I know that u cant get higher honor level if u Honored by ur own duo. Is it the same with reports?

replies.body:
You can get honors from friends, I believe: it's just slower.

You can also be punished by ANY valid report, no matter who it comes from. The system simply scans your behavior for issues, and doesn't care who reported you.
Yes, you can get punished if a friend submits a valid report.
yes if you break the rules it works
The real question is : were you really inting ? Because if not, your "friends" don't seem very friendly.
